revised_title: Temperature Effects on Geotropism in Asplenium bulbiferium
tldr: The author conducted experiments to study the effects of temperature on geotropism in the plant Asplenium bulbiferium. They found that temperature influences plant growth and geotropism, with a decrease in sensitivity occurring in winter. The results indicate a relationship between temperature and the presentation time required for geotropism, which can be used to better understand plant responses to environmental factors.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Physiology
